entry.title: One Line
entry.content:
• Weâ€™ve always fooled around together since we were kids.
    • Weâ€™ve shared the most exciting moments, but every story has an end.
    • No one can stay a kid forever.
    • Time moves on, and people grow up.
    • We must go our separate ways.
    • You keep going even after Im gone.
entry.summary: <ul> <li>Weâ€™ve always fooled around together since we were kids.<ul> <li>Weâ€™ve shared the most exciting moments, but every story has an end.
